cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.GR, cs.GT, cs.SG. 

The paper deals with the continuous unfolding of convex polyhedra, which is a topic in computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also involves the refinement of unfoldings, which can be seen as a problem in data structures (cs.DS). The concept of blooming is related to graph theory and planar graphs, which are topics in graph theory (cs.GT) and graph drawing (cs.GR). Finally, the paper discusses the properties of convex polyhedra, which can be seen as a topic in computational geometry (cs.CG) and topology (cs.SG).
